item.title: Open Source Hardware Documentation Jam
item.description:
• News tags:

  • "Molly O'Connor" excerpt: "Molly attended the Open Source Hardware Documentation Jam this past weekend at NYU."

Molly attended the Open Source Hardware Documentation Jam this past weekend at NYU. The meeting brought together a diverse group of engineers, developers and designers who focused on improving documentation â€¦
